description: The 25-year-old model stunned in an emerald green gown at the Burberry Menswear A/W16 show on Monday.
title: Jourdan Dunn ups the glamour in silk dress at Burberry LCM show
title_page: Jourdan Dunn ups the glamour in silk dress at Burberry LCM show | Daily Mail Online
text:
The likes of Brooklyn Beckham and Mark Ronson attended the Burberry Menswear A/W16 show.
But Jourdan Dunn completely stole the limelight from the boys when she arrived at the London fashion event in a gorgeous ensemble, looking effortlessly glamorous as she took pride of place in the front row on Monday.
The 25-year-old model stunned in an emerald green gown, wearing a chic fur stole draped around her shoulders for extra warmth.
Scroll down for video
Gorgeous in green: Jourdan Dunn looked absolutely incredible as she rocked up at the Burberry Menswear A/W16 show in London on Monday
Jourdan displayed a liberal amount of skin in her stunning dress which boasted a plunging neckline and a dangerously high side split.
The standout dress was fastened together at the waist with a gold broach, showcasing her svelte legs in all their glory.
The mother-of-one dressed up the look with a fur stole in soft shades of grey and beige, and sported a pair of statement strappy heels on her feet.
Fashion statement: The 25-year-old model dressed up her look with a fur stole in shades of grey and beige
Glamazon: Jourdan added extra height to her towering frame thanks to a pair of strappy stilettos
Gorgeous: The catwalk queen's silk number was fastened at the waist with a gold broach
Elegant: Jourdan's daring ensemble was completed with a slick of dark berry lipstick
Getting the giggles: The model was spotted having a fit of laughter as she chatted to pals outside the venue
The glamazon styled her locks in messy waves and chose a plum-coloured lipstick to enhance her pout.
Jourdan has been busy over the last few days, hitting the runway for Moschino during London Collections Men in an array of quirky and colourful menswear inspired looks.
The star previously admitted she thinks about retiring from modelling in order to care for her five-year-old son Riley, who has sickle cell anemia.
Making friends: Jourdan Dunn posed with handsome male model Johannes Huebl
Cute clutch: The striking star accessorised her look with a small brown leather handbag
Pride of place: Jourdan was sitting pretty on the FROW at the Burberry menswear show
In good company: The striking beauty was seated in between Nick Grimshaw (L) and Jack Guinness (R)
Cosy: Johannes also joined them to watch the unveiling of the British brand's Autumn/Winter 2016 collection
'I thought about giving up all the time,' she told The Times. 'I didn’t enjoy being away from my family.
'I would rather be at home with my friends. I didn’t enjoy the attitude. The politics. It was just too much.'
'On one occasion I remember crying down the phone to my mum: "I don’t want to do this. It is not worth it. I am miserable".'
Closing the show: The previous day, Jourdan walked for Jeremy Scott (L) in the Moschino show
Vibrant: The statuesque stunner modelled an array of colourful looks in the must-see show
Flashing a smile: Jourdan was in great spirits as she left the venue following the runway event
Keeping cosy: She donned an electric blue padded jacket with a hood from Moschino
